description: A pirate crew led by the brothers Caribou and Coribou. Known for their violent nature, particularly Caribou's practice of burying people alive.

keyMoments.title: Caribou Punishes Fake Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: After being tricked into joining the Fake Straw Hats, Caribou attacks them, revealing his plan to infiltrate and kill the real Straw Hat Pirates from the inside.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Caribou Pirates as antagonists with violent intent toward the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Attack on Thousand Sunny
keyMoments.description: The Caribou Pirates attack the Thousand Sunny underwater as the Straw Hats journey to Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the conflict for upcoming episodes and shows the crew's aggressive pursuit of the Straw Hats.

statusHistory.reason: Crew is operational and pursuing the Straw Hats
